name: Kava Time
description: Kava is a root crop that is endemically used in the South Pacific as a drink in social settings. It has analgesic properties and is currently being researched and also capsulated by Big Pharma for its various medicinal properties. Traditionally drunk from a coconut bowl out of a Tanoa, with respectful clapping gestures on conclusion of drink. Anytime is Kava time in the South Pacific whether its tea at work or supper at night before bedtime.
